title: ENGLISH Hentai Pack : Shiwasu No Okina (630 MB)
description:
For previews, you can refer to the page where I downloaded the zips, it also has pictures galleries :

- http://www.hentairules.net/2007/08/15/redirection-page-shiwasu-no-okinas-works-on-hentairules/ -

Here is a pack with all the english translated works by Shiwasu No Okina and some hand-picked original additional other works.

Shiwasu No Okina is a hentai artist specialized in schoolgirls, pop idols, uniform fetish and sometimes futanari.
The drawings are very hardcore (uncensored, blowjobs, titfucks, vaginal, anal, double fucks, groupsex, sometimes in color) and the stories always have a very funny scenario.

That&#039;s something like 300 MB of english stuff :)

Detailed contents :
(english)
- Nerusen [English]
- Shiwasu No Okina [English] (yeah, same title as the artist&#039;s name)
- Nosewaruse [English]
- Sei So Tsui Dan Sha [English]
- Shining Musume 1 chapters 1-2-3-4 [English]
- Shining Musume 2 [English]
- Shining Musume Act 16 [English] 
- Shining Musume Side Story 2 [English] 
- The Case Of The JR Group [English]
(original)
- Shaimusurakugaki
- Shining Musume 1-2-3-4-5-6 (the complete serie)

If you can&#039;t extract the files, then rename the zips to a smaller file name or extract them at the root of your disk and not in a sub-sub-sub-sub-sub-subfolder. That helps :D

Happy leeching ;)
